summary: In the 70s two brothers battle killer waves, conservative society and ruthless bikers to kick-start the modern surf industry.
cast: Myles Pollard|Xavier Samuel|Sam Worthington|Lesley-Ann Brandt|Robyn Malcolm|Steve Bastoni|Aaron Glenane|John Fairhead|Sean Keenan|Kai Arbuckle|Riley Holley|Campbell Madden|Igor Sas|Dave Englert|Lee Cummings|Harrison Buckland-Crook|David Meadows|Greg McNeill|Brianna Wheatley|Tim Duffy|Maurie Ogden|Murray Dowsett|Sita Bennett|Emma Daley|Alex Cater|Luke Green|Edward Kilgallon|David Bowers|Michael Loney|Gregg Argaet|Laura Fairclough|Sarah Louella|Andy King|Sarah Sonneville|Timothy Nathan|Rick Jakovich|Ben Mortley|Ross Clarke-Jones|Philip Miolin|Lindsay Baker|Michael Barnes|Kirsty Hillhouse|Craig Mathieson|Todd Cummings|Holly Jones|Dave Christison|Anton Wilson|Mitchell Taylor|Frederick Reidy|Cam O'Bernie|Joanna Wren|Morgan O'Neill|Woody|Chloe|Zaneta Van Zyl
title: Drift
